text: awlm yar almukadhibun balbeth baed almawt 'anana nasuq alma' 'iilaa al'ard alyabisat alghlyzt alty la naba'at fyha, fanukhrij bih zreana mkhtlfana 'alwanuh takul minh aneamhm, wttghdha bih abdanhm fyeyshwn bh? 'afala yarawn hadhih alnaeam baeynhm, fyelmu 'ana allah aladhi faeal dhlk qadir ealaa 'iihya' al'amwat wnashrhm min qbwrhm?
